metadata.title: CVE-2022-3219 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: GnuPG can be made to spin on a relatively small input by (for example)crafting a public key with thousands of signatures attached, compresseddown to just a few KB.

criterions.comment: gnupg package in trusty/esm is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-09-28').
gnupg2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
